item.title: Suspected plot to attack Belgian PM foiled
item.description: Police officers have arrested two individuals and find a suspected improvised explosive device at one of the suspect's homes.

item.title: US to send 200 troops to Israel to monitor Gaza ceasefire
item.description: The US will establish a multinational force in Israel, likely to include troops from Egypt, Qatar, Turkey and the UAE, officials say.

item.title: Peru's president removed from office amid soaring crime
item.description: The ousting of President Dina Boluarte follows a string of scandals and growing outrage over crime in Peru.

item.title: Major Russian strikes cut power across Kyiv
item.description: Drone and missile strikes caused blackouts in Kyiv and killed a seven-year-old in Ukraine's south-east, officials say.

item.title: Tech billionaires seem to be doom prepping. Should we all be worried?
item.description: The debate is ramping up about what happens if - or when - computer intelligence overtakes humans
